__TOC__

Welcome to the '''Ubuntu Vancouver LoCo''' reporting page. Every month this page is updated by UVLC designates with summaries of our major accomplishments. (This is not meant to be a meeting summary, nor a play-by-play.) If you like to document, and want to get involved with team reporting, please contact '''rrnwexec''' https://launchpad.net/~rrnwexec

Reporting included here is due by the '''22nd''' of every month (for accomplishments from the previous calendar month.)

=== April 2009 ===

Major activities:
<<BR>>
* Hosted Jaunty Jackalope 9.04 Release Party.
* Increased membership numbers to approx. 60, continuing exponential growth.
* Established presence on MySpace, Flickr, and Craigslist postings to help the public find us.
* Hosted April General Meeting. Planned Installfest and "Ubuntu Women" event.
* Search Engine Optimization (including Google AdWords) to help even more people find us!

=== March 2009 ===

Major activities:

* Established an <nowiki>[[CanadianTeam-Vancouver-uvEAM|"Evangelism Advocacy and Marketing"]]</nowiki> team to grow the group.
* Established presence on identi.ca, Twitter, Meetup.com and Facebook to help the public find us.
